description:
Do you have an idea for a novel but, you don't know where to start? You can see it so clearly in your head but can't seem to put it on the page? Novel writing without a guide can be scary or even intimidating. Where do you start? 

Luckily you found the right place. Guyton-Moore Strategic Services' the Basic's of Novel Writing is just what you need and this course is only available on Udemy. With us by your side your masterpiece will shine like a gem. In Guyton-Moore Strategic Services' the Basics of Novel Writing we will go over everything you will need to know on the basic level of novel writing.

Including how to prewrite your work so that you can properly see your ideas and formulate your manuscript before beginning chapter one. 

We will also be discussing how to overcome writer's block and other creative stoppages that threaten all novel writers. Learn about practices you need to avoid to successfully write your final draft. 

You can also expect these important subjects: Types of Conflict, Plot Development, Advantages and Disadvantages of each POV, Scene Transition and of course many more in Guyton-Moore Strategic Services’ The Basics of Novel Writing. We look forward to arming you with the tools you will need to master the art of novel writing.
title: The Basics of Novel Writing
